input_text:
Job Title: Sr. Director of Channel Partnerships

Location: Santa Monica, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
We are Route

Buying stuff online can get messy once you hit that “order” button. Managing dozens carrier tracking links, dealing with lost or damaged packages, and resolving issues with customer support can feel like a wild goose chase. That’s why we created the Route — to make the post-purchase experience for consumers like you, and the brands you love, as seamless as possible.

Route is on a mission to connect the world’s commerce. Through our network of millions of Route App users and thousands of merchants, we’re making it easier than ever for consumers to track, insure, and discover their favorite products in one place — which connects the world’s best direct-to-consumer brands to happy, repeat customers.

Since Route launched in 2018, we’ve been on a journey to build innovative products that empower our customers, all while fostering a people-first, values-driven company culture. We’re looking for talented people across the ecommerce space to join us on the next steps of this adventure.

Don’t just take our word for it! Discover what life at Route has to offer.

The team

The Route Partnership team discovers, onboards, and nurtures partnerships with global, innovative brands that want to build a modern relationship with their customers — from checkout to delivery and beyond. Thousands of merchants are part of the Route network today, and we're just getting started!

The opportunity

E Commerce is an industry that thrives on partnerships. We’re looking for someone at Route that has the ability to roll up their sleeves and help acquire and manage new strategic channel partnerships while building out a team and supporting operational structures to scale in the future.

What You’ll Do

Develop and implement comprehensive channel partnership strategies to meet or exceed revenue targets.Identify, recruit, and onboard new channel partners while nurturing existing relationships to optimize engagement and productivity.Work closely with the sales and marketing teams to develop collaborative programs that drive partner success and align with our business objectives.Conduct regular performance analysis to ensure active alignment and achievement of key performance indicators and return on investment.Negotiate and finalize partnership agreements, ensuring compliance and mutual benefit.Serve as the primary liaison between channel partners and internal teams, facilitating communication and project management to ensure partner satisfaction and project success.Provide training and ongoing support to channel partners on product offerings, sales techniques, and market trends.Lead, mentor, and scale the channel partnerships team to build a high-performing department.Stay abreast of industry trends, competitive landscape, and market conditions to adapt strategies as necessary.

Qualifications:

At least 10 years of experience in channel development, partner management, or business development, with a proven track record in managing successful partnerships.Strong leadership skills with experience managing teams and cross-departmental projects.Excellent negotiation, communication, and presentation skills.Demonstrable ability to think strategically and analytically about business, product, and technical challenges.Comfortable working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and managing multiple projects simultaneously.High level of initiative, creativity, and drive to achieve business objectives.Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field; MBA preferred.

Equal opportunity for all

Route is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We embrace diversity and equal opportunity in a serious way. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. The more inclusive we are, the better our work will be.

Total Rewards

We know our team works best when everyone feels happy, healthy, and supported. We offer to pay 100% of your health insurance premiums on a $0 deductible plan for you and your family, remote or hybrid work arrangements, unlimited PTO, 401k matching, formalized growth opportunities, learning & development, DEI programs & events, and so much more.

Pay Transparency

Salary for this role: Base $176,000 - $200,000 + Bonus + Equity

The cash compensation above includes base salary, and is not reflective of potential commission for employees in eligible roles, or annual bonus targets under Route’s bonus plan for eligible roles. In addition to cash compensation, all Route employees are eligible to participate in Routes equity incentive plan to receive stock options per the terms of the agreement. Some roles may also be eligible for overtime pay. Individual compensation packages are based on a few different factors unique to each candidate, including their career level, skills, experience, specific geographic location qualifications and other job-related reasons.

Experience Level (if available): Director

output_json.title: Sr. Director of Channel Partnerships
output_json.summary: Lead the Route Partnership team to discover, onboard, and nurture global, innovative brand partnerships.
job_responsibilities: Develop and implement comprehensive channel partnership strategies.
Identify, recruit, and onboard new channel partners.
Work closely with sales and marketing teams to develop collaborative programs.
Serve as primary liaison between channel partners and internal teams.
Lead and scale the channel partnerships team.
output_json.company_information: Route is an Equal Opportunity Employer with a focus on building a diverse and inclusive team.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Route is committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills.
